data.eml:eml: A new deep-water goatfish of the genus Upeneus (Mullidae) from Vanuatu, South Pacific

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Uiblein, Franz, Causse, Romain (2013): A new deep-water goatfish of the genus Upeneus (Mullidae) from Vanuatu, South Pacific. Zootaxa 3666 (3): 337-344, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3666.3.4
